Class RrdMemoryBackend

java.lang.Object
  org.jrobin.core.RrdBackend
      org.jrobin.core.RrdMemoryBackend
public class RrdMemoryBackend
extends RrdBackend

Backend which is used to store all RRD bytes in memory.
